scripts.linuxFullRebuild: npm run copyNew && npm run linuxBuildSkeleton
scripts.windowsFullRebuild: npm run copyNew && npm run windowsBuildSkeleton
scripts.resetDist: npm run removeDist && mkdir dist && cd dist && mkdir assets && cd ..
scripts.linuxResetAndStart: npm run resetDist && npm run linuxFullRebuild && node .
scripts.windowsResetAndStart: npm run resetDist && npm run windowsFullRebuild && node .
scripts.linuxInstallSkeleton: npm run copyServerFiles && npm run resetDist && npm run linuxFullRebuild
scripts.windowsInstallSkeleton: npm run copyServerFiles && npm run resetDist && npm run windowsFullRebuild
scripts.copyServerFiles: npm run copyEnvFile && npm run copyKnexFile && npm run copyIndex
scripts.copyNew: npm run copyDefaultAssets && npm run copyDefaultTheme && npm run copyPackage
scripts.windowsBuildSkeleton: npm run windowsBuildCss --theme=custom-game-theme-test && npm run windowsBuildClient --theme=custom-game-theme-test
scripts.linuxBuildSkeleton: npm run linuxBuildCss --theme=custom-game-theme-test && npm run linuxBuildClient --theme=custom-game-theme-test
